title: 2nd Chance's Bizarre Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon Adventure
body:
Current chapter update: 

http://i.imgur.com/MF7Wj2K.jpg/img

Also a question to help ease and prevent a page loading problem - 

> [{quoted}](name=2nd Chance,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=vay58gAA,comment-id=0020,timestamp=2017-05-02T21:58:47.083+0000)
>
> Hmmm... I don't really want to overload this 3rd page with another chapter part post tomorrow... I need an excuse to get this to the 4th one and ease the page loading load...
> 
> ... Less see...
> 
> Ah this will work -
> 
> What's everyone's favourite moment so far with these 5 and a half chapters written so far?
> 
> @Mods & Rito amigos - Don't you lads and lasses be afraid to comment about this too if you've been reading along so far as well. Heck, I don't mind if you wanna join in this too, all yah gotta do is comment and I'll do my best to slip you in when I can just like anyone else.

######I'll update the OP image/message so you all know whenever I update this.

___

I just started playing Pokemon Super Mystery Dungeon, yet I'm gonna make this more fun for myself and make you all Pokemon that I meet along the way. 

######Fair note, I'm playing this for the first time, so Idk what might happen.

All you gotta do is comment in here and wait till I get something.

To give you something to comment about as well, take this personality test I found with a quick google search to see what Pokemon you'd be in Mystery Dungeon - Explorers Of The Sky terms if you'd like to:

https://www.proprofs.com/quiz-school/story.php?title=pokemon-personas_2KE

Tested through myself real quick to see if it's legit, and apparently I'm the modest type, which makes me a Vulpix.

http://i.imgur.com/crOUcHy.png/img

... neat?

Anyways, let's get started!
____

I did the in-game beginning personality quiz, and it tried to make me a Torchic, but

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/177/970/d7f.gif

and became a Pikachu instead (I always be one in these games cuz I'm used to it and Discharge is busted).

After getting chased out by the 3 jerkineros and meeting up with a Nuzleaf, I'm about to meet my partner who will join me for the rest of this bizzarre adventure...

http://i.imgur.com/e4JAwhR.jpg/img

Question is...

_what did I make him be?_

######Hint: He isn't a Riolu cuz that's what the game tried to make him, but I didn't want him to be that, dang thing didn't even have a fighting type move to start with.

____

Short-cut Chapter links -

> * Chapter two - [Meeting GIJose](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/vay58gAA-2nd-chances-bizarre-pokemon-super-mystery-dungeon-adventure?comment=0008)
> * Chapter 3 - [On a Hill Where a Large Tree Stands](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/vay58gAA-2nd-chances-bizarre-pokemon-super-mystery-dungeon-adventure?comment=0010)
> * Chapter 4 - [Field Trip - Part 1](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/vay58gAA-2nd-chances-bizarre-pokemon-super-mystery-dungeon-adventure?comment=0018)
> * Chapter 4 - [Field Trip - Part 2](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/vay58gAA-2nd-chances-bizarre-pokemon-super-mystery-dungeon-adventure?comment=0019)
> * Chapter 5 - [Harmony Scarves - Part 1](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/vay58gAA-2nd-chances-bizarre-pokemon-super-mystery-dungeon-adventure?comment=001f)
> * Chapter 5 - Harmony Scarves - Part 2
